text:
Peter "Finn" Wittrock, Jr. (born October 28, 1984) is an American actor and screenwriter.
In 2011, he performed in playwright Tony Kushner's Off-Broadway play "The Illusion" and made his Broadway debut in 2012 as Happy Loman in the revival of Arthur Miller's play "Death of a Salesman", directed by Mike Nichols.
In 2014, he appeared in "The Normal Heart", "Noah", and "Unbroken". He is also known for his roles in ', ' and in '.
In 2018, he played murder victim Jeffrey Trail in the FX crime drama series '.
